nodes.text: I've been r-r-riding on this train forever. I must have fell asleep. I must have fell asleep. I must have...
OF COURSE I'M NOT WELL, Y-Y-YOU INSO- . . . I'm sorry. I-It's just, I'm so lost.
Y-Yes. Puh-Puh-Puh-Puh-Puh-P-. . . *sigh* Please help me find my way.
I d-don't remember. . . Something about a mu-mu-murder. There was a murder I think? A murder? A murder?
Some woman got ku-killed. Something in the nyuh-nyuh-newspaper.
transitions: Tell me more about this murder
Any other ideas as to where you were heading?

nodes.text: Maybe a mu-mu-murder where I-I-I was heading-uh? Ohhhhhhh... IF ONLY THIS BLASTED TRAIN . . .!!!! *sigh*
transitions: Any other clues as to where you were heading?

nodes.text: I'm sorry. Everything is so... hazy.
